Kaisa.name: Kai'Sa
Kaisa.title: Daughter of the Void

skins.name: K/DA ALL OUT Kai'Sa Prestige Edition

Kaisa.lore: Claimed by the Void when she was only a child, Kai'Sa managed to survive through sheer tenacity and strength of will. Her experiences have made her a deadly hunter and, to some, the harbinger of a future they would rather not live to see. Having entered into an uneasy symbiosis with a living Void carapace, the time will soon come when she must decide whether to forgive those mortals who would call her a monster, and defeat the coming darkness togetherâ€¦ or simply to forget, as the Void consumes the world that left her behind.
Kaisa.blurb: Claimed by the Void when she was only a child, Kai'Sa managed to survive through sheer tenacity and strength of will. Her experiences have made her a deadly hunter and, to some, the harbinger of a future they would rather not live to see. Having entered...
allytips: Try to catch enemy carries alone to burst them with Icathian Rain.
Work with your teammates to set up your Ultimate and optimize damage with your passive.
Make sure to buy items that will evolve at least 1 or 2 of your spells.
enemytips: Kai'Sa is very good at picking off isolated enemies. Stick together against her.
Kai'Sa is very vulnerable to getting outranged by mages and long range carries.
Make sure to place wards in your blind spots so you can see Kai'Sa coming.

spells.name: Icathian Rain
spells.description:
Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets.

Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.
spells.tooltip:
Kai'Sa launches {{ e2 }} missiles that split among nearby enemies, each dealing {{ totalindividualmissiledamage }} physical damage. Additional hits on champions or jungle monsters deal {{ e3 }}% damage.

Evolved: Kai'Sa instead fires {{ e7 }} missiles.
Current: {{ spell.kaisapassive:evolutiontrackerq }}/{{ e6 }} Bonus Attack Damage

spells.name: Void Seeker
spells.description:
Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive.

Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.
spells.tooltip:
Kai'Sa fires a void blast that deals {{ totaldamage }} magic damage, applies {{ e4 }} stacks of Plasma, and grants True Sight of the first enemy hit for {{ spell.kaisapassive:pduration }} seconds.

Evolved: Kai'Sa instead applies {{ e5 }} stacks of Plasma and hitting a champion reduces the Cooldown by {{ e3 }}%.
Current: {{ spell.kaisapassive:evolutiontrackerw }}/{{ e2 }} Ability Power

spells.name: Supercharge
spells.description:
Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed.

Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.
spells.tooltip:
Kai'Sa supercharges her void energy, gaining {{ totalmovespeed }} Move Speed and becoming Ghosted while charging, then gaining {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Attacks reduce this Ability's Cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Evolved: Kai'Sa also becomes Invisible for {{ e7 }} seconds.
Current: {{ spell.kaisapassive:evolutiontrackere }}/{{ e6 }}% Bonus Attack Speed

spells.name: Killer Instinct
spells.description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.
spells.tooltip: Kai'Sa warps near an enemy champion affected by <keywordMajor>Plasma</keywordMajor> and gains <shield>{{ rcalculatedshieldvalue }} Shield</shield> for {{ rshieldduration }} seconds.

passive.name: Second Skin
passive.description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.
